role.argrole: starting time arg0's been in a state up to now

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 证券法) (NN 草案)) (VP (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 从) (NP (NN 起草))) (VP (VV 至今)))) (VP (VV 历经) (QP-OBJ (CD 六) (CLP (M 年))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 将)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 明天)) (VP (VV 举行)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NP (NP-PN (QP (OD 九) (CLP (M 届))) (NP (DP (DT 全)) (NP (NN 国))) (NP (NN 人大))) (NP (NN 常委会))) (QP (OD 六) (CLP (M 次))) (NP (NN 会议))) (NP (NN 闭幕会))) (LC 上))) (VP (VSB (VV 表决) (VV 通过))))))
